title: How to Right Click on iPad

steps.title: Locate the link.
steps.content: Locate the link. Go to the page with the link you want to right-click. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap and hold on the link.
steps.content: Tap and hold on the link. Using your finger, tap on the link and hold for a couple of seconds until the context menu pops up. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Explore the right-click menu options.
steps.content: Explore the right-click menu options. On links, the right-click options often include actions such as Open, Open in Background, and Open in New Private Window . Tap on any of the choices listed in the menu. This method can be used on any type of link, including embedded links and image links.

steps.title: Open your browser.
steps.content: Open your browser. On your iPad, enter your web browser app. Safari is the default web browser for iPad, so use this app if you haven't installed one yourself.

steps.title: Go to a tab.
steps.content: Go to a tab. Tabs will appear either at the top or bottom of your screen, depending on your browser. Tap on the tab you want to right-click. If you only have one tab open, skip this step.

steps.title: Press-hold on the tab.
steps.content: Press-hold on the tab. Tap and hold on the tab at the top of the browser. This action will pull up all of the context menu options. [3] X Research source This menu will list the options to Copy the tab, Close Other Tabs, Arrange Tabs By Title, and Arrange Tabs By Website . The press-hold action can also be done to highlight, copy, and paste sections of text on any application. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Go to your home screen.
steps.content: Go to your home screen. Navigate to your home screen by opening your iPad, by pressing the home button, or by swiping up on the bottom of your screen.

steps.title: Find an app.
steps.content: Find an app. Once on your home screen, swipe to the page with the app you want to right-click.

steps.title: Press-hold on the app.
steps.content: Press-hold on the app. Tap on the app and hold for a couple of seconds. This action will bring up the right-click menu. [5] X Research source The right-click menu will list the options to Edit Home Screen, Share App, and Delete App. Depending on the app, more choices may be listed.

steps.title: Open iMessage.
steps.content: Open iMessage. On your iPad, navigate to the iMessage app.

steps.title: Go to a conversation.
steps.content: Go to a conversation. From the menu on the right, tap on a conversation.

steps.title: Press-hold on a message.
steps.content: Press-hold on a message. Hold your finger down on a message in the conversation to pull up the right-click menu. [6] X Research source The options on the right-click menu in iMessage include Reply, Copy, and More... . Tapping the More option allows you to select and delete messages from the conversation.
